testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the course category with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request is sent with valid authorization credentials, correct id, and data to the

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updateCategory/637" path parameters................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "Web Development 101" information to send to the api updateCategory endpoint..undefined * The api user sends a "PATCH" request body and saves the returned response..skipped * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................skipped * The api user confirms that the remark information in the response body is "success"..skipped * The api user verifies that the Message information in the response body is "Successfully Updated.".skipped * The api user verifies that the "Updated Category Id" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..skipped
